thread.title: Nicki Minaj and Remy Ma are beefing right now and dear god nobody was ready for all the shade
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj and Remy Ma are beefing right now and dear god nobody was ready for all the shade

author: MJ Franklin
title: Nicki Minaj and Remy Ma are beefing right now and dear god nobody was ready for all the shade
text:
Hope you're hungry, because Nicki Minaj is serving up some prime, grade-A beef between her and fellow rapper Remy Ma, and we were all unprepared.
The internet went into collective freakout mode on Thursday night after rapper Gucci Mane released a new track, "Make Love," featuring Nicki Minaj.
On the track Nicki raps:
" Oooohhh, oh you the qu-e-e-the queen of this here?/
One platinum plaque, album flopped, bitch, where? (bitch, where?)...
You see, silly rabbit, to be the queen of rap/
You gotta sell records, you gotta get plaques. "
via GIPHY
Little background, here: Nicki Minaj has famously declared herself the Queen of Rap, on several occasions—including but not limited to her feature on Ariana Grande's "Side to Side" (" I'm the queen of rap, young Ariana run pop ") and her feature on Rae Sremmurd's "No Flex Zone - Remix" (" Run this game for 5 years/ guess that's why my feet hurt...Yes, I am an icon, that's me on your t-shirt ").
And many considered this "Make Love" verse to be the clapback at Remy Ma everyone's been waiting for.
So: Why would Nicki Minaj be clapping back at Remy Ma, you ask?
On December 25, 2016—because shade does not take time off for Christmas— New York rapper Phresher released a video for his song "Wait A Minute (Remix)" featuring Remy Ma. And in the song Remy Ma raps,
"Will I smoke this bitch? Yes/
Probably fail my piss test/
Get rid of those fake breasts/
And put a vest on this bitch chest."
The lyrics pinged the internet's collective shade barometer as a shot at Nicki Minaj and her then-boyfriend Meek Mill (who'd previously failed a urine test and was put on house arrest).
I'm so confused.
Remy Ma stated she doesn't like/want to be put up against Nicki. But she goes after Nicki in every verse. pic.twitter.com/J2LCV87WIu
— MICHAEL MARAJ (@Michael_Maraj) December 30, 2016
so we just gonna ignore the fact remy ma bodied nicki on a few beats already and nicki been real quiet.. ok cool
— - (@sheCheatnOnU) December 29, 2016
I need to learn how to ignore people the same way Nicki be ignoring Remy Ma
— MO (@YPreeNee) December 29, 2016
Nicki never responded. Until this new Gucci Mane track. A move that had even American treasure Issa Rae like: " Sis, don't. "
Nicki, don't Meek this up.
— Issa Rae (@IssaRae) February 25, 2017
Because sure enough, Remy Ma opened the library and read Nicki for filth, by releasing "Shether," a scorching hot 7-minute diss track the likes of which the world hasn't seen since Drake famously eviscerated Meek Mill in 2015.
"You wanna see a dead body" (little kid from BoyzNdaHood voice) @nickiminaj #Barz #AndBARZonly https://t.co/KKPFlmTERL pic.twitter.com/3tA9sukLah
— Remy Ma (@RealRemyMa) February 25, 2017
And the internet did what it does when there's great beef: ate it up, and lost its damn mind .
the four stages of listening to remy ma ether nicki minaj pic.twitter.com/8OM2MBixMr
— cai ✨📚 (@owlbees) February 25, 2017
Me: I'm so over celebrity drama it's such a waste of time
"Remy ma drops Nicki diss track"
Me: pic.twitter.com/nBLzAliqf1
— ❔ (@anisasx) February 25, 2017
Thought y'all was being dramatic when y'all said remy ma killed nicki on a diss track
Hears diss track: pic.twitter.com/QOUjb6l9rd
— #Titanup ⚔️🗡 (@St0nedSt00p_kid) February 25, 2017
People when Remy Ma disses Nicki vs. when Remy drops an album pic.twitter.com/d8KnwgOGuy
— j (@JUSTlNW) February 25, 2017
how many times did you drag Nicki Minaj in that diss track?
Remy Ma: pic.twitter.com/5C3O6lAGQv
— ZEF (@beatsbyzef) February 25, 2017
LMFAOOO y'all are really too quick ! Wikipedia said Remy Ma killed Nicki Minaj already lma pic.twitter.com/vPspYkAIrA
— Kaya Rosado 👸🏽 (@Kayaa__) February 25, 2017
Meek mill listening to Remy ma nicki Minaj diss like pic.twitter.com/gxrVafN3hx
— Smooth Operator (@xoandnuvo) February 25, 2017
And now, the two rap goddesses are shading each other on social media, because of course they are.
😏😊😌😉😈 #RemyMafia #PlataOPlomo 💰🔫 pic.twitter.com/uRstOEMhK2
— Remy Ma (@RealRemyMa) February 25, 2017
😘 she said *bey 🎀
A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:58am PST
😍😘
A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 25, 2017 at 1:14pm PST
The moral of the story: whether you're a Nicki fan or a Remy Ma fan, your wig has just been snatched. Also: Saturdays, great for rap beef on the internet.
